attributes.action: be informed about the violent activities by the opposition slpp party in sierra leone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we are concerned sierra leoneans living in the uk who are gravely worried with the involvement of the slpp in the recent violent activities in the capital freetown, kenema and pujenhun.this act by the slpp is aimed at distabilizing the government of dr.earnest bai koroma. we come against this act in no uncertain terms.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
